E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Contract offer
FYI- New York (Y) has offered me a better contract!
They offer a BIG amount of money!

Regards,
Jody Reed



Date: Sunday, 2/5/1991
Subject: Contract offer
FYI- I still prefer the offer from New York (Y).
They offer more years.

Regards,
Jody Reed



Date: Friday, 2/17/1991
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Detroit has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Jody Reed



Date: Friday, 3/3/1991
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Jay Howell



Date: Friday, 3/3/1991
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Chicago!

Regards,
Jay Howell



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Eric Yelding
Dear Sir,
Eric Yelding has nothing more to prove at AA Pittsfield Valley Cats!
He has an AVG of .303 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/6/1991
Subject: Progress of Carlos Reyes
Dear Sir,
Carlos Reyes has nothing more to prove at A Daytona Cubs!
He has an ERA of 2.53 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/9/1991
Subject: Playing time
Manager,
I am not very happy about my playing time recently.
I think I deserve a starting spot!

Regards,
Dwight Smith



Date: Wednesday, 5/10/1991
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Tim Raines

Sincerly,
Your PR Director
